Text: This is a Holy Grail collection, for all of us who enjoy excellent films. Many thanks for sharing this as a reference for future requests.

Looked through your list

Colossus Of Rhodes would be great at some time.

Cimmaron would be good too.

If you know of someone with Land of the Pharoahs---that would be a real Bonus.

THANKS----great collection

Big, massive, huge, thank you for taking the time to upload a host of classics that i am downloading. 
You are a very generous person. 
I will seeeeeeeeeeeeeeeed!
Hi Auge, can you upload Faust (1926) please?
Also, Les Enfants du Paradis? Please :)
'The Spirit of the Beehive' as well! (I'm so terribly sorry for these dis-jointed comments!)

Wow, this is awesome. Thank you so much for uploading these marvelous movies. You are INCREDIBLY generous!!
Hate to bug you but I see you have a few Vittorio De Sica ones and I've been trying to get hold of Il tetto (The Roof) for so long now... (My bf's grandparents saw it at the cinema! and they want to see it again). If you maybe know where I could get it, I would much appreciate if you pointed me in the right direction.
THANKS A MILLION, AUGE!!!
